spec: add a new plugin called docx-agent which uses a read_docx_text tool to extract the text from a word doc like the one under files. Use the mammoth node lib to create the tool. Add the filetree to the prompt and create the read_docx_text tool by expecting the path to the file (inside the workspace) and using mammoth to extract the raw text and do with it what ever the user asks.
commitMessage: Added ignore rules for 'files' and 'test/coverage' directories.
